languages.text: "Прощай, призрак. Надеюсь, небытие скоро призовет тебя назад в свои объятия".
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
languages.original_text: "Прощай, призрак. Надеюсь, небытие скоро призовет тебя назад в свои объятия".

traits.locale_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."
"Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

languages.text: 「さらばだ、亡霊よ。すぐに無の抱擁へと帰るがいい」
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: 「さらばだ、亡霊よ。すぐに無の抱擁へと帰るがいい」

languages.text: “再见了，鬼魂。希望虚无能很快将你召回到它的怀抱。”
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: “再见了，鬼魂。希望虚无能很快将你召回到它的怀抱。”

languages.text: « Adieu, fantôme. J'espère que vous retrouverez bientôt l'étreinte du néant. »
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: « Adieu, fantôme. J'espère que vous retrouverez bientôt l'étreinte du néant. »

languages.text: «Adiós, fantasma. Espero que la nada te atraiga de nuevo hacia sus brazos».
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: «Adiós, fantasma. Espero que la nada te atraiga de nuevo hacia sus brazos».

languages.text: "Lebt wohl, Geist. Ich hoffe, dass das Nichts Euch bald wieder in seine Arme ruft."
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: "Lebt wohl, Geist. Ich hoffe, dass das Nichts Euch bald wieder in seine Arme ruft."

languages.text: "Hoşça kal hayalet. Dilerim hiçlik seni kucağına çok yakında yeniden çağırır."
languages.original_text: "Farewell, ghost. I hope nothingness summons you back into its embrace soon."

traits.locale_text: "Hoşça kal hayalet. Dilerim hiçlik seni kucağına çok yakında yeniden çağırır."
